name: Cloud Torrent
short_description: Cloud-based BitTorrent client with streaming support.
description: Cloud-based BitTorrent client with streaming support. Cloud Torrent is a self-hosted application focused on download, utility, torrent, p2p. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Cloud Torrent on your home server to cloud-based bittorrent client with streaming support without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Cloud Torrent to manage your download workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
